Title: Homebodies
Plot: Grissom and Warrick get the case of an elderly woman found mummified in her closet. Sarah and Nick arrive to investigate a 'break and enter' to find a raped teen. Catherine looks into a found gun, now linked to a week-old murder.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Stephen Root, Jeanette Brox, M. C. Gainey, Paul Francis, Vince Vieluf, Thomas Wilson Brown, Francis Capra, Bill Jacobson, Brandon Kirsch, Keith Pillow, Christine Romeo, Barry Sigismondi, Ross Simanteris, Ron Mele
